title: USBC
text: USB-C, technically known as USB Type-C, is a 24-pin USB connector system, which is distinguished by its 2 fold rotational-symmetrical connector. The USB Type-C Specification 1.0 was published by the USB Implementers Forum (USB-IF) and was finalized in August 2014. It was developed at roughly the same time as the USB 3.1 specification.
